title: cygan
author: cygan
created_time: July 07, 2023, 03:04:20 PMLast edit: October 26, 2024, 06:48:35 AM by cygan
content: we‚Äôre thrilled to finally unveil the Icarus collector cards for sale. this first-generation proof of concept contains no keys, and is intended as a collector‚Äôs item. each card design is part of a limited series, with only 25 editions available for each design (1st batch). this limited run amplifies your card's exclusivity. as a special bonus, with every card purchase, we're including a complimentary sticker that matches your card's design. this exclusive feature not only adds a personal touch but also acts as a keepsake, an emblem of your pioneering involvement in the exciting world of blockchain technology. crafted from pristine, robust white plastic, our cards are designed to last and withstand everyday wear and tear. an essential feature of our cards is the embossed serial number and production block time. the serial number verifies your card's authenticity and your unique position within the 1st batch 25 edition run. the block time represents the exact moment your card was created in our production blockchain, making each card a unique artifact in blockchain history. in essence, our blockchain collectible cards represent more than just collector's items; they symbolize your commitment and passion for the transformational power of blockchain technology. ready to own a part of blockchain history? add the amount of cards you wish to order below. act fast as these limited edition collectible cards are expected to sell out quickly!the buyers who already had a fixed serial number at CK (see this reference thread) will again be assigned the same one. lower serial numbers are at a 'first come, first serve' basisfrom the overview below you can see the respective and to order cards incl. serial numbers:üîêIcarus Sticker Edition 1üîê STICKER.D1.W1 - comments.body: to all buyers first of all thank you for your trust and that you want to go the common way with us there are still some sets left. if you can, get one, because soon there will be an auction with gold/silver/copper cards, which will match the design of the white cards.btw please don't forget to pay
